spec_data.Name: rubygem-test-unit
spec_data.License: (GPLv2 or Ruby) and (GPLv2 or Ruby or Python) and (LGPLv2+ or Ruby)
spec_data.Description:
Test::Unit 2.x - Improved version of Test::Unit bundled in
Ruby 1.8.x.
Ruby 1.9.x bundles minitest not Test::Unit. Test::Unit
bundled in Ruby 1.8.x had not been improved but unbundled
Test::Unit (Test::Unit 2.x) will be improved actively.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 21 Sep 2017 09:35:44 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Improved version of Test::Unit bundled in Ruby 1.8.x
